Title: Experimental Investigation of Static and Dynamic Crosstalk in Trench-Assisted Multi-Core Fiber
Source: Opt. Fiber Commun. Conf. Exhib., OFC - Proc.
Abstract: © 2019 OSA.We investigate the time-dependent crosstalk characteristics of trench-assisted multi-core fibers in a temperature controlled environment. Results indicate that temperature, PRBS length, modulation format and signaling rate impact the intensity and volatility of inter-core crosstalk.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
